decks.notes: The main concept of this deck revolves around using combo interactions and synergy between various cards. The deck utilizes a mix of creature tutors (Eldritch Evolution, Invasion of Ixalan), mana acceleration (Hazoret's Monument, Llanowar Elves, Elvish Mystic), and card draw (Collected Company, Risen Reef, Prosperous Innkeeper) to create a powerful combo engine. Key cards like Birgi, God of Storytelling, Grinning Ignus, and Runaway Steam-Kin are used to generate mana and additional resources, allowing for explosive turns and potentially overwhelming the opponent. The mana base includes multiple lands that support the deck's strategy (Boseiju, Who Endures, Cragcrown Pathway) and provides the necessary colors of mana (Copperline Gorge, Botanical Sanctum, Steam Vents).

This deck revolves around using Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Indomitable Creativity to create powerful tokens and cheat out high-cost artifacts using low-cost ones. The deck also includes a combination of control and removal spells like Stern Lesson, Make Disappear, Prismari Command, and Magma Opus to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck utilizes counterspells like Negate and Divide by Zero to protect its combo pieces. It also includes a mix of lands to ensure proper mana fixing and consistency, while including powerful lands like Otawara, Soaring City and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance.
